GT.content: most serious stake of political economy: certain social classes have more time than others; but time cannot be given, it is certainly not time that they possess
GT.linkedContent: most serious stake of political economy: certain social classes have more time than others; but time cannot be given, it is certainly not time that they possess

GT.content: in “Counterfeit Money,” wealth, fortune, is natural, as if nature had decided this belonging to social class
GT.linkedContent: in “Counterfeit Money,” wealth, fortune, is natural, as if nature had decided this belonging to social class

GT.content: social function of beggar, madman: “the pocket of an indispensable internal exclusion,” like structure of pharmakos, incorporation w/out introjection (assimilation), an identity by exclusion, keeps outside w/in, l’exception faite (fors) d’une clôture ou d’un clivage intérieur
GT.linkedContent: social function of beggar, madman: “the pocket of an indispensable internal exclusion,” like structure of pharmakos, incorporation w/out introjection (assimilation), an identity by exclusion, keeps outside w/in, l’exception faite (fors) d’une clôture ou d’un clivage intérieur

GT.content: beggar as profound index of socius, at foundation of social contract
GT.linkedContent: beggar as profound index of socius, at foundation of social contract

GT.content: beggars (in their exteriority) can represent absolute demand of the Other, inextinguishable appeal, unquenchable thirst for the gift
GT.linkedContent: beggars (in their exteriority) can represent absolute demand of the Other, inextinguishable appeal, unquenchable thirst for the gift

SPOM.content: for Marx, ultimate support for dominant discourse: identity, self-identity of social class [Derrida believes he can suspend this idea while still inheriting from Marx]
SPOM.linkedContent: for Marx, ultimate support for dominant discourse: identity, self-identity of social class [Derrida believes he can suspend this idea while still inheriting from Marx]

POOF.content: Schmitt’s Hegelian heritage, oppositional negativity is teleologically political (impossible to distinguish subject/object in speculative idealism); for Schmitt, Hegel fundamentally a political thinker, begins w/ Man as ‘evil,’ ‘dangerous’; for Schmitt, Marxism bears torch of Hegel in concrete-enemy of international class [Lukács]
POOF.linkedContent: Schmitt’s Hegelian heritage, oppositional negativity is teleologically political (impossible to distinguish subject/object in speculative idealism); for Schmitt, Hegel fundamentally a political thinker, begins w/ Man as ‘evil,’ ‘dangerous’; for Schmitt, Marxism bears torch of Hegel in concrete-enemy of international class [Lukács]

WAP.content: “classes”—goes too fast [instead, Derrida says: certain groups or social circles w/ their dialects and subcodes]
WAP.linkedContent: “classes”—goes too fast [instead, Derrida says: certain groups or social circles w/ their dialects and subcodes]

DPi.content: re: U.S., who can deny DP as political justice is class justice
DPi.linkedContent: re: U.S., who can deny DP as political justice is class justice

DPi.content: Marx, as he does so often, by reducing juridical/judicial phenomena so quickly/brutally to ideological & superstructural effects of class struggle, doesn’t take into account relative autonomy, duration, efficacy of the juridical
DPi.linkedContent: Marx, as he does so often, by reducing juridical/judicial phenomena so quickly/brutally to ideological & superstructural effects of class struggle, doesn’t take into account relative autonomy, duration, efficacy of the juridical

RGE.content: via Bataille, consumption of [general economy’s?] excess of energy by a determined class is not the destructive consuming of meaning, it’s the significative reappropriation of surplus value w/in restricted economy > if sovereignty is absolutely revolutionary, revolution w/in restricted economy (reorganization of world of work, redistribution of values w/in space of meaning) is still a necessary phase w/in strategy of general economy
RGE.linkedContent: via Bataille, consumption of [general economy’s?] excess of energy by a determined class is not the destructive consuming of meaning, it’s the significative reappropriation of surplus value w/in restricted economy > if sovereignty is absolutely revolutionary, revolution w/in restricted economy (reorganization of world of work, redistribution of values w/in space of meaning) is still a necessary phase w/in strategy of general economy

C.content: all genealogies come down to classifying [a last dwelling place?], and you know Derrida’s taste for taxonomy
C.linkedContent: all genealogies come down to classifying [a last dwelling place?], and you know Derrida’s taste for taxonomy

C.content: class is not lacking, it’s at work (series, lineage, rank, hierarchy, etc.) > but what doesn’t come under (n’en relève plus) class is perhaps fate (le sort) > no classification table for fate
C.linkedContent: class is not lacking, it’s at work (series, lineage, rank, hierarchy, etc.) > but what doesn’t come under (n’en relève plus) class is perhaps fate (le sort) > no classification table for fate

BSi.content: one is never bête all on one’s own: class-structure in accusation of stupidity [re: Flaubert, Valéry]
BSi.linkedContent: one is never bête all on one’s own: class-structure in accusation of stupidity [re: Flaubert, Valéry]
